title: Ryze Update: How to Create a Generic Mage 101 (While Watering Down the Role Choices).
body: Riot steadily making Brand useless. No reason to pick him with this Ryze update. New Ryze now has the pre 6 waveclear he never used to have, the range he never needed and more burst then ever before all ramping up into his late game insanity.

replies.body: Don't worry, Brand may not have as much clear potential as Ryze post rework, but he'll have the skills needed to kill a Ryze
